00034 /*
00035  * Weak references
00036  */
00037 
00038 typedef struct reference_t {
00039   dfsch_type_t* type;
00040   dfsch_object_t* object;
00041   size_t live;
00042 } reference_t;
00043 
00044 dfsch_type_t dfsch_weak_reference_type = {
00045   DFSCH_STANDARD_TYPE,
00046   NULL,
00047   sizeof(reference_t),
00048   "weak-reference",
00049   NULL,
00050   NULL,
00051   NULL
00052 };
00053 
00054 static int register_weak_pointer(void** pointer, void* object){
00055   if (object && GC_base(object)){ 
00056     /* Causes random crashes with non GC'able objects*/
00057     GC_general_register_disappearing_link(pointer, object);
00058     return 1; 
00059   }
00060   return 0;
00061 }
00062 
00063 /* We cannot use dfsch_make_object() here - we need to call GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC */
00064 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_make_weak_reference(dfsch_object_t* refered){
00065   reference_t* ref = (reference_t*)GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(sizeof(reference_t));
00066 
00067   ref->type = DFSCH_WEAK_REFERENCE_TYPE;
00068   
00069   ref->object = refered;
00070   ref->live = 1;
00071   register_weak_pointer((void**)&ref->live, refered);
00072 
00073   return (dfsch_object_t*)ref;
00074 }
00075 
00076 int dfsch_weak_reference_live_p(dfsch_object_t* reference){
00077   reference_t* ref;
00078   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(reference) != DFSCH_WEAK_REFERENCE_TYPE)
00079     dfsch_error("exception:not-a-reference", reference);
00080   ref = (reference_t*) reference;
00081 
00082   return ref->live;
00083 }
00084 
00085 dfsch_object_t* dereference(reference_t* ref){
00086   if (!ref->live){
00087     ref->object = NULL;
00088     return NULL;
00089   } else {
00090     return ref->object;
00091   }
00092 }
00093 
00094 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_weak_reference_dereference(dfsch_object_t* reference){
00095   reference_t* ref;
00096   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(reference) != DFSCH_WEAK_REFERENCE_TYPE)
00097     dfsch_error("exception:not-a-reference", reference);
00098   ref = (reference_t*) reference;
00099 
00100   return GC_call_with_alloc_lock((GC_fn_type)dereference, ref);
00101 }
00102 
00103 typedef struct weak_vector_t {
00104   dfsch_type_t* type;
00105   size_t length;
00106   dfsch_object_t** data;
00107   int set;
00108 } weak_vector_t;
00109 
00110 
00111 dfsch_type_t dfsch_weak_vector_type = {
00112   DFSCH_STANDARD_TYPE,
00113   NULL,
00114   sizeof(weak_vector_t),
00115   "weak-vector",
00116   NULL,
00117   NULL,
00118   NULL,
00119   NULL
00120 };
00121 
00122 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_make_weak_vector(size_t length, dfsch_object_t* fill){
00123   weak_vector_t* v = (weak_vector_t*)dfsch_make_object(DFSCH_WEAK_VECTOR_TYPE);
00124   size_t i;
00125 
00126   v->length = length;
00127   v->set = 0;
00128   v->data = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(sizeof(dfsch_object_t*) * length);
00129 
00130   for(i = 0; i<length; ++i){
00131     v->data[i] = fill;
00132     v->set = register_weak_pointer((void**)&v->data[i], fill);
00133   }
00134 
00135   return (dfsch_object_t*)v;
00136 }
00137 size_t dfsch_weak_vector_length(dfsch_object_t *vector){
00138   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(vector) != DFSCH_WEAK_VECTOR_TYPE)
00139     return 0;
00140 
00141   return ((weak_vector_t*)vector)->length;  
00142 }
00143 
00144 dfsch_object_t** dfsch_weak_vector_as_array(dfsch_object_t *vector, 
00145                                             size_t *length){
00146   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(vector) != DFSCH_WEAK_VECTOR_TYPE)
00147     dfsch_error("exception:not-a-weak-vector",vector);
00148 
00149   if (length){
00150     *length = ((weak_vector_t*)vector)->length;
00151   }
00152 
00153   return ((weak_vector_t*)vector)->data;
00154 }
00155 
00156 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_weak_vector_from_array(dfsch_object_t **array, 
00157                                              size_t length){
00158   weak_vector_t* v = (weak_vector_t*)dfsch_make_object(DFSCH_WEAK_VECTOR_TYPE);
00159   size_t i;
00160 
00161   v->length = length;
00162   v->data = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(sizeof(dfsch_object_t*) * length);
00163 
00164   for(i = 0; i<length; ++i){
00165     v->data[i] = array[i];
00166     register_weak_pointer((void**)&v->data[i], array[i]);
00167   }
00168 
00169   return (dfsch_object_t*)v;
00170 }
00171 
00172 
00173 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_weak_vector_ref(dfsch_object_t *vector, size_t k){
00174   weak_vector_t* v;
00175 
00176   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(vector) != DFSCH_WEAK_VECTOR_TYPE)
00177     dfsch_error("exception:not-a-weak-vector",vector);
00178 
00179   return v->data[k];
00180 }
00181 
00182 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_weak_vector_set(dfsch_object_t* vector, size_t k, 
00183                                       dfsch_object_t* obj){
00184   weak_vector_t* v;
00185 
00186   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(vector) != DFSCH_WEAK_VECTOR_TYPE)
00187     dfsch_error("exception:not-a-weak-vector",vector);
00188 
00189   v = (weak_vector_t*) vector;
00190 
00191   if (v->length <= k){
00192     dfsch_error("exception:invalid-index",dfsch_make_number_from_long(k));
00193   }
00194   
00195   if (v->set){
00196     GC_unregister_disappearing_link((void**)&v->data[k]);
00197   }
00198 
00199   v->data[k] = obj;
00200   v->set = register_weak_pointer((void**)&v->data[k], obj);
00201 
00202   return vector;
00203 }
00204 
00205 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_weak_vector_2_list(dfsch_object_t* vector){
00206 
00207   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(vector) != DFSCH_WEAK_VECTOR_TYPE)
00208     dfsch_error("exception:not-a-vector",vector);
00209 
00210   return dfsch_list_from_array(((weak_vector_t*)vector)->data, 
00211                                ((weak_vector_t*)vector)->length);
00212 }
00213 
00214 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_list_2_weak_vector(dfsch_object_t* list){
00215   dfsch_object_t** data;
00216   size_t length;
00217   data = dfsch_list_as_array(list, &length);
00218   return dfsch_weak_vector_from_array(data, length);
00219 }

00221 /*
00222  * weak-key-hash
00223  */ 
00224 
00225 #define HIDE_OBJECT(o) ((dfsch_object_t*) ~((size_t) (o)))
00226 #define REVEAL_OBJECT(o) HIDE_OBJECT(o)
00227 
00228 typedef struct weak_hash_entry_t weak_hash_entry_t;
00229 
00230 struct weak_hash_entry_t {
00231   dfsch_object_t* key;
00232   dfsch_object_t* value;
00233   size_t live;
00234   weak_hash_entry_t* next;
00235 };
00236 
00237 static weak_hash_entry_t* weak_hash_entry_create(dfsch_object_t* key,
00238                                                  dfsch_object_t* value,
00239                                                  weak_hash_entry_t* next){
00240   weak_hash_entry_t* e = GC_NEW(weak_hash_entry_t);
00241 
00242   e->key = key;
00243   e->value = value;
00244   e->next = next;
00245   e->live = 1;
00246 
00247   return e;
00248 }
00249 static weak_hash_entry_t* find_entry(weak_hash_entry_t** head,
00250                                      dfsch_object_t* key,
00251                                      size_t* count){
00252   weak_hash_entry_t* tmp;
00253   weak_hash_entry_t* i;
00254   weak_hash_entry_t* res = NULL;
00255 
00256   i = *head;
00257 
00258   while (i && !i->live){
00259     i = i->next;
00260     *head = i;
00261     (*count)--;
00262   }
00263 
00264   if (!i){
00265     return NULL;
00266   }
00267 
00268   if (i->key == key){
00269     res = i;
00270   }
00271   tmp = i;
00272   i = i->next;
00273 
00274   while (i){
00275     if (!i->live){
00276       tmp->next = i->next;
00277       i = i->next;
00278       (*count)--;
00279       continue;
00280     }
00281     if (i->key == key){
00282       res = i;
00283     }
00284     i = i->next;
00285   }
00286 
00287   return res;
00288 }
00289 
00290 typedef struct weak_key_hash_t {
00291   dfsch_type_t* type;
00292   dfsch_rwlock_t* lock;
00293   size_t mask;
00294   size_t count;
00295   weak_hash_entry_t** buckets;
00296 } weak_key_hash_t;
00297 
00298 #define DEFAULT_WEAK_KEY_HASH_SIZE 128
00299 
00300 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_make_weak_key_hash(){
00301   weak_key_hash_t* h = dfsch_make_object(DFSCH_WEAK_KEY_HASH_TYPE);
00302 
00303   h->mask = DEFAULT_WEAK_KEY_HASH_SIZE - 1;
00304   h->buckets = GC_MALLOC(DEFAULT_WEAK_KEY_HASH_SIZE*sizeof(weak_hash_entry_t*));
00305   h->count = 0;
00306   h->lock = DFSCH_CREATE_RWLOCK();
00307 
00308   return (dfsch_object_t*)h;
00309 }
00310 
00311 static weak_hash_entry_t* weak_key_entry_create(dfsch_object_t* key,
00312                                                 dfsch_object_t* value,
00313                                                 weak_hash_entry_t* next){
00314   weak_hash_entry_t* e = weak_hash_entry_create(HIDE_OBJECT(key), value, next);
00315   register_weak_pointer(&e->live, key);
00316   return e;
00317 }
00318 static size_t ptr_hash(dfsch_object_t* ptr){
00319   size_t a = (size_t)ptr;        
00320   size_t b = (size_t)ptr >> 16 | (size_t)ptr << 16;
00321 
00322   a ^= b >> 2;
00323   b ^= a >> 3;
00324   a ^= b << 5;
00325   b ^= a << 7;
00326   a ^= b >> 11;
00327   b ^= a >> 13;
00328   a ^= b << 17;
00329   b ^= a << 23;
00330   
00331   return b ^ a;
00332 }
00333 static int weak_key_hash_ref(weak_key_hash_t* h,
00334                              dfsch_object_t* key,
00335                              dfsch_object_t** res){
00336   weak_hash_entry_t* e;
00337   uint32_t hash = ptr_hash(key);
00338   
00339   /* 
00340    * There is no need to perform any special locking regarding GC,
00341    * worst possible outcome of race condition with GC here is returning
00342    * value that should be instead discarded, but this is still perfectly 
00343    * valid value. It is reasonable to expect that user code can cope with 
00344    * this in some meaningful manner (with doing nothing being pretty 
00345    * reasonable).
00346    */
00347   DFSCH_RWLOCK_RDLOCK(h->lock);
00348 
00349   e = find_entry(&h->buckets[hash & h->mask], HIDE_OBJECT(key), &h->count);
00350 
00351   if (!e){
00352     DFSCH_RWLOCK_UNLOCK(h->lock);
00353     return 0;
00354   }
00355 
00356   
00357   *res = e->value;
00358   DFSCH_RWLOCK_UNLOCK(h->lock);
00359   return 1;
00360 }
00361 static void weak_key_hash_set(weak_key_hash_t* h,
00362                              dfsch_object_t* key,
00363                              dfsch_object_t* value){
00364   uint32_t hash = ptr_hash(key);
00365   weak_hash_entry_t* e;
00366   
00367   DFSCH_RWLOCK_WRLOCK(h->lock);
00368 
00369   e = find_entry(&h->buckets[hash & h->mask], HIDE_OBJECT(key), &h->count);
00370   
00371   if (e){
00372     e->value = value;
00373   }else{
00374     h->count++;
00375     h->buckets[hash & h->mask] = 
00376       weak_key_entry_create(key,
00377                             value,
00378                             h->buckets[hash & h->mask]); 
00379   }
00380 
00381   DFSCH_RWLOCK_UNLOCK(h->lock);
00382 }
00383 
00384 dfsch_custom_hash_type_t dfsch_weak_key_hash_type = {
00385   {
00386     DFSCH_CUSTOM_HASH_TYPE_TYPE,
00387     DFSCH_HASH_BASETYPE,
00388     sizeof(weak_key_hash_t),
00389     "weak-key-hash",
00390     NULL,
00391     NULL,
00392     NULL,
00393     NULL
00394   },
00395   (dfsch_custom_hash_ref_t)weak_key_hash_ref,
00396   (dfsch_custom_hash_set_t)weak_key_hash_set,
00397   
00398 };

00407                                                   dfsch_object_t* args, 
00408                                                   dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){

00410

00412   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00413 
00414   return dfsch_make_weak_reference(object);
00415 }
00416 static dfsch_object_t* native_weak_reference_live_p(void *baton, 
00417                                                     dfsch_object_t* args, 
00418                                                     dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00419   dfsch_object_t* reference;
00420 
00421   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, reference);
00422   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00423 
00424   return dfsch_bool(dfsch_weak_reference_live_p(reference));
00425 }

00441 static dfsch_object_t* native_make_weak_vector(void* baton, 
00442                                                dfsch_object_t* args, 
00443                                                dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00444   size_t length;
00445   dfsch_object_t* fill;
00446 
00447   DFSCH_LONG_ARG(args, length);
00448   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, fill, NULL);
00449   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00450 
00451   return dfsch_make_weak_vector(length,fill);
00452 }
00453 
00454 static dfsch_object_t* native_weak_vector(void* baton, 
00455                                           dfsch_object_t* args, 
00456                                           dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00457   return dfsch_list_2_weak_vector(args);
00458 }
00459 static dfsch_object_t* native_weak_vector_length(void* baton, 
00460                                                  dfsch_object_t* args, 
00461                                                  dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00462   dfsch_object_t* vector;
00463   
00464   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args,vector);
00465   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00466 
00467   return dfsch_make_number_from_long(dfsch_weak_vector_length(vector));
00468 
00469 }
00470 static dfsch_object_t* native_weak_vector_ref(void* baton, 
00471                                               dfsch_object_t* args, 
00472                                               dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){

00474   size_t k;
00475 
00476   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, vector);
00477   DFSCH_LONG_ARG(args, k);
00478   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00479 
00480   return dfsch_weak_vector_ref(vector, k);
00481 }

00485                                               dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){

00492   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, obj);

00495   return dfsch_weak_vector_set(vector, k, obj);

00530 void dfsch__weak_native_register(dfsch_object_t *ctx){
00531   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "<weak-reference>", DFSCH_WEAK_REFERENCE_TYPE);
00532   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "<weak-vector>", DFSCH_WEAK_VECTOR_TYPE);
00533   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "<weak-key-hash>", DFSCH_WEAK_KEY_HASH_TYPE);
00534 
00535 
00536   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "make-weak-reference", 
00537                     dfsch_make_primitive(&native_make_weak_reference,NULL));
00538   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "weak-reference-live?", 
00539                     dfsch_make_primitive(&native_weak_reference_live_p,NULL));
00540   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "weak-reference-dereference", 
00541                     dfsch_make_primitive(&native_weak_reference_dereference,
00542                                          NULL));
00543   
00544   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "make-weak-vector", 
00545                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_make_weak_vector,NULL));
00546   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "weak-vector", 
00547                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_weak_vector,NULL));
00548   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "weak-vector-length", 
00549                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_weak_vector_length,NULL));
00550   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "weak-vector-set!", 
00551                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_weak_vector_set,NULL));
00552   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "weak-vector-ref", 
00553                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_weak_vector_ref,NULL));
00554   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "weak-vector->list", 
00555                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_weak_vector_2_list,NULL));
00556   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "list->weak-vector", 
00557                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_list_2_weak_vector,NULL));
00558 
00559   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "make-weak-key-hash", 
00560                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(make_weak_key_hash));
00561 
00562 }
